channel.title: Cve on less on sec
channel.description: Recent content in Cve on less on sec

item.title: CVE-2024-29019: Authentication bypass via Cross site request forgery in ESPhome
CVE-2024-27081: Remote code execution via arbitrary file write in ESPHome
CVE-2023-27216: OS command injection vulnerability in D-Link DSL-3782
item.description: An issue found in D-Link DSL-3782 v.1.03 allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary code as root via OS command injection in multiple setting pages. Settings known to be affected by this issues are:

item.title: CVE-2022-44900: path traversal vulnerability in py7zr
item.description: Directory traversal vulnerability in SevenZipFile.extractall() function of the python library py7zr version 0.20.0 and earlier allow attackers to read and write arbitrary files on the local machine via malicious 7z file extraction.
